mapper.sql: COMMODITYID, COMMODITYNAME, PRICE, UNITS, COUNTS, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, MAXAPPLYNUM, STATUS, BREEDID, TRADEDAYS, CODEDELIVERY, NONISSUEREG, PUBMEMBERID, MINAPPLYNUM, MINAPPLYQUAMOVE, PUBLISHALGR, DEALERPUBCHARATIO, MKTDEAPUBCHARATIO, PUBLISHERCHARATIO, MKTPUBCHARATIO, CURRSTATUS, SUPERVISEDPRICE, LISTINGDATE, LASTTRADATE, CONTRACTFACTOR, MINPRICEMOVE, MINQUANTITYMOVE, SPREADALGR, SPREADUPLMT, SPREADDOWNLMT,CONTRACTFACTORNAME,MAPPERID, TRADEALGR, BUY, SELL, MKTBUYFEERADIO, MKTSELLFEERADIO, WAREHOUSEDAILYRENT, WAREHOUSESTARTDAY, TRUSTEEDAILYRENT, INSURANCEDAILYRENT, INSURANCESTARTDAY, FREETRUSTEEDAYS, DELIVERYUNIT, DELIUNITTOCONTRACT, DELIVERYSTARTDAY, REGISTFEERADIO, MKTREGISTFEERADIO, CANCELFEERADIO, MKTCANCELFEERADIO, DELIVERYCOSTBEFORE,TRANSFERFEERADIO ,COMMDETAILS,DELIVERYPROP
mapper.select:
select
from (select t.*,rownum TNO from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF t where t.BREEDID = #{breedid} order by t.COMMODITYID ) a where a.TNO between #{beginnum} and #{endnum}

select
from (select t.*,rownum TNO from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF t order by t.COMMODITYID) a where a.TNO between #{beginnum} and #{endnum}

select
from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF order by COMMODITYID

select
from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF order by COMMODITYID
select count(*) from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF where BREEDID = #{breedid}
select count(*) from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF

select
from (select t.*,rownum TNO from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF t where 1=1
and t.PUBMEMBERID like concat(#{record.pubmemberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.COMMODITYID like concat(#{record.commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.COMMODITYNAME like concat(#{record.commodityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by t.PUBMEMBERID) a where a.TNO between #{beginnum} and #{endnum}

select count(*) from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF where 1=1
and PUBMEMBERID like concat(#{pubmemberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select
from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF c where c.commodityid in (select t.commodityid from ipo_publisher_position t group by t.commodityid having sum(t.subscricounts) > 0) order by c.COMMODITYID

select
from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF where COMMODITYID = #{commid}
select COMMODITYID from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF order by COMMODITYID

#{commdetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVERYPROP = #{deliveryProp,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where COMMODITYID = #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT G.* FROM (SELECT A.*, C.CATEGORYNAME, ROWNUM TNO FROM (SELECT T.COMMODITYID,T.COMMODITYNAME, T.BREEDID,B.BREEDNAME, B.SORTID,T.DELIVERYPROP FROM IPO_COMMODITY_CONF T LEFT JOIN IPO_BREED B ON T.BREEDID = B.BREEDID) A LEFT JOIN M_CATEGORY C ON A.SORTID = C.CATEGORYID WHERE 1=1
and A.COMMODITYID like concat(#{record.commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and A.COMMODITYNAME like concat ('%', concat(#{record.commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
ORDER BY A.COMMODITYID ) G WHERE G.TNO BETWEEN #{beginnum} and #{endnum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT A.*, C.CATEGORYNAME FROM (SELECT T.COMMODITYID,T.COMMODITYNAME,T.BREEDID,B.BREEDNAME, B.SORTID, T.DELIVERYPROP FROM IPO_COMMODITY_CONF T LEFT JOIN IPO_BREED B ON T.BREEDID = B.BREEDID) A LEFT JOIN M_CATEGORY C ON A.SORTID = C.CATEGORYID
and A.COMMODITYID like concat(#{record.commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and A.COMMODITYNAME like concat ('%', concat(#{record.commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
)
mapper.update: update IPO_COMMODITY_CONF set STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where COMMODITYID = #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from f_account where code=#{subject}
mapper.update: insert into f_account(Code,Name,accountLevel,dCFlag) select #{parentSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||#{commoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},name||#{commoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},3,'C' from f_account where code=#{parentSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select commodityname from ipo_commodity_conf where COMMODITYID=#{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select COMMODITYID, COMMODITYNAME from ipo_commodity_conf
